title: Person
description: Abstract class for inheritance by the Insider and Accomplice objects. Describes the properties of an individual that MAY be inherited by those classes.

first_name.description: The first, or given, name of the individual.

middle_name.description: The middle name of the individual.

last_name.description: The last, or family, name of the individual.

suffix.description: The name suffix of the individual.

alias.description: A list of aliases (other names) the individual has used, and/or the anonymized of the individual in court records.

city.description: The city (or county/district) that the person resided in at the time of the incident.

state.description: The state (or region) that the person resided in at the time of the incident.

country.description: The country that the person resided in at the time of the incident. Public implementations should use the standard codes provided by ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

postal_code.description: The postal code that the person resided in at the time of the incident.

country_of_citizenship.description: Citizenship(s) of the person. Public implementations should use the standard codes provided by ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

nationality.description: The nationality or nationalities of the person.

residency.description: Residency status if the person was not a citizen of the country where they resided during the incident.

gender.description: Sex or gender at the time of the incident.

age.description: Age at the time that the incident began.

education.description: Highest level of education at the time the incident began.

marital_status.description: The marital status at the time of the incident.

number_of_children.description: The number of children that the person is responsible for, at the time of the incident.

comment.description: Comments or clarifications regarding any of the Person properties.
